ference and the sake of clarity - the Ark is in

ach it, unless something totally unexpected

e is located in what would now be South America (Think Amazon

a or somewhere about)

> On 4/2/12, Sandy Panico <magicquartz@...> wrote:
>> =
Tucson follows Rodimus and to be sure he could be heard, he roars to his
>>=
 Maximal comrades, in a tone of voice that clearly signals them that he was=

>> still very much alive .  He then looks down to Rodimus and gets beside =
him.
>> 
>> " For once, I agree with you.  We may not always see eye to eye=
 but it
>> doesn't mean I don't respect who you are.  Now, our only hope to=
 escape this
>> threat is to relocate all together.  We must return to the =
Ark and see if we
>> can get it flying just enough to relocate its position=
.  Before I became a
>> warrior, I did extensive work in mechanical and wea=
ponry restoration.  I
>> haven't lost sight of those skills. I can attempt =
to restore the essential
>> components for transport, and worry about the r=
est at a later time.  Of
>> course I will need a bit of help from anyone wi=
th engineering as their
>> background, which I believe Stanton and Bump, al=
ong with Legacy, could be a
>> big help.  All right, let's guide them home!=
"

off

aze!

>>>> <OLD>
>>>> 
>>>> Tucson hears his voice and immediately real=
izes that the bird is actually
>>>> Rodimus.  He widens his eyes and dives =
toward him, flying over his leader
>>>> with out stretched wings, acting li=
ke a shield to protect him and
>>>> Nightlight.  He looks down.
>>>> 
>>>> =
" Sorry, slight miscalculation, won't happen again.  I thought the clouds
>=
>>> held water but they don't .  If I knew there was water I could stop the=

>>>> ash
>>>> and fire.  I must try to climb higher, beyond the smoke cove=
r.  But first
>>>> your saftey is most imperative.  Get into my talons, you=
 will be safe in
>>>> there under my draconic armor."
>>>> 
>>>> He opens h=
is talons to receive his comrades.  Ash rains down on his wings
>>>> and ba=
ck yet he ignores the sting and burn of their impact.

>=
>> As TUSCON tried to fly over and protect RODIMUS it is quickly evident
>>=

ary sparrow or hawk but he was a giant phoenix with flamed

of his wings and entire frame like a bonfire. Only his

eld the smaller form of NIGHTLIGHT was cool and dark.

quickly turned to ash and char when his flames hit

ke dark magma began to flow from the mountain.

ust get the rest of the Maximals to safety.=E2=80=9D RODIMUS flew
